channel.title: Making NPCs fight?
channel.description:
Hi.
Is there any way to make NPCs fight one another, for example, having 4 ardougne guards trying to kill KBD?
I just thought it would be cool to make a minigame where about 20 pyrefiends are against 20 icefiends, 20 fire giants vs 20 ice giants, the fire side led by Fareed, the ice led by the Ice Queen. The object would be to kill as many of the opposing NPCs as possible, as you would choose a side to help. The winner is the team with the most NPCs standing after 5 mins/the team left alive.
Just a thought. Retard Monkey

@Retard_Monkey wrote:

OK
